Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the entitlement of Nigerian customers to bank fines on failed transactions.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence or support from the 14-page circular issued by the central bank.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that affected customers will receive the payment, but there is no official statement or evidence supporting this.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or possibilities regarding the regulation.
